text: Rasbora armitagei is a minnow endemic to Sri Lanka. The fish was discovered from a small tributary of Kalu Ganga at Rakwana, South-Western Wet zone, Sri Lanka. This species is named after naturalist David Armitage. ==See also== *Rasbora naggsi ==References== Category:Rasboras Category:Fish described in 2010
title: Rasbora armitagei
